item.title: Pregnant Carefree
item.description: Postpartum Depression Care Project The Pregnant Care free app is a dedicated platform designed to assist mothers in mitigating the symptoms of postpartum depression. In our app, we hope to build a warm and easy place for you to relax: with places for sharing daily moments, posting emotions, and engaging in forums, you can say whatever you want with other postpartum women or experienced experts. Experts can offer professional guidance through advice posts, enhancing support for regular users.
